content: the comfort of handmade slips plus the functionality of actual shoes these chukka-style slippers with flip flop soles are here to bring joy to your feet using nothing but single_crochet stitches and inexpensive flip flops you ll nurture your inner cobbler skills to bring your perfect pair of slippers to life and it may surprise you how durable these handmade house shoes can be whether you re working from home doing a grocery pickup or taking the dog out you ll be cozy comfy and stylish whenever you go this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and includes a step-by-step photo tutorial and link to a video tutorial at the end of the pdf you ll find a printable ruler guide for poking the holes in your flip flop soles this is extremely helpful in ensuring you meet the pattern gauge and that your slippers fit these crochet slippers with flip flop soles are written in three women s shoe sizes small women s shoe size 5-6 flip flop length approx 9 5 medium women s shoe size 7-8 flip flop length approx 10 large women s shoe size 9-10 flip flop length approx 10 5 you ll need approximately 170g of category 6 super bulky weight yarn such as lion brand wool-ease thick & quick as well as a small amount of strong category 3 cotton yarn for the soles this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew downloading -
